log:
**Note**
⚠️ Experimental 1.20 worlds created in the previous snapshot (23w07a) can no longer be opened in this version

**Changes**
✨ The enchantment glint for items in the inventory has been made more visible
💧 Potions no longer have an enchantment glint due to it obscuring the color of the potion contents
♿ Added a built-in resource pack that enhances the contrast of UI elements, which can be enabled in the Accessibility Options screen
🖥️ The appearance of the tab bar in the Create New World screen has been updated
🖌️ The Brush crafting recipe now uses a Feather, Copper Ingot and Stick in a vertical line
⚙️ New `execute` sub-command for finding positions on top of a heightmap. Changes the height of the execution position to be on top of the given heightmap
- `execute positioned over <heightmap>`

**Fixes**
<:mc_heart:589630433243955205> Axolotls no longer give the Regeneration effect to nearby players after they kill a mob, and do not grant "The Healing Power of Friendship!" advancement
🏞️ Create new world screen appears even when world is created; clicking on button causes freeze or crash
🐴 Camels, horses and mules bounce high into the air when being ridden across water
🐪 Sitting camels don't stand up and begin following players that are tempting them with their favorite food
🌸 On existing snapshot servers, cherry grove biomes cannot be found with "/locate", nor do they generate
📦 Disabling experimental features on the world creation screen causes pack validation to fail
🗯️ Some mobs panic when receiving fall damage
🔥 Cherry Logs and Wood can't be used as fuel in furnaces
<:iron_golem:631748221131292674> The server process crashes when making a slime ride a iron golem
🖌️ Brush Recipe is in the Vanilla datapack, not 1.20

...And more changes & fixes!
title: **1.19.4 Pre-release 1**
